issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: webconsole
components.description: Web console such as the old and the new hawtio console

fields.description: i create 2 broker within the same machine and with the same os user. they named : "amq_pro" and "amq_test". They all work very well. but,the webconsole has a problem. the first started borker'webconsole is fine, the second started borker'webconsole has an exception occurred processing JSP page. comments.body:
Hello,

I have the same problem only change the context.

org.apache.jasper.JasperException: An exception occurred processing JSP page /queues.jsp at line 59.

I'm solving this problem, stopping the affected broker, emptying entire directory "data" which is kahab and started the broker again to generate a new kahab. But this is not good practice.

I face same issue for AMQ version 5.14.2 & jdk1.8.0_121.   | WARN | | org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler | qtp89448984-3695 org.apache.jasper.JasperException: An exception occurred processing
